name: B. Nearest Fraction
statement:
You are given three positive integers . Your task is to find the nearest
fraction to fraction whose denominator is no more than . Formally, you
should find such pair of integers that the value is as minimal as
possible.If there are multiple "nearest" fractions, choose the one with
the minimum denominator. If there are multiple "nearest" fractions with
the minimum denominator, choose the one with the minimum numerator.
